sub_title: International Sales Strategy Manager at Stage Entertainment
summary:
Philipp is an enthusiastic and diligent manager with more than 15 years of experience in the aviation sector. He worked and lived in six countries across continents leading teams to superior performance. Philipp  took on team leading and strategic decision making roles in pricing and revenue management, aviation network development and sales planning. During the period of integrating Austrian Airlines into Lufthansa, Philipp also gained experience on syndicating business processes and generating synergies with a focus on Eastern Europe, the Middle East and Asia Pacific. Within the various roles Philipp took in his long career at Austrian Airlines and Lufthansa, he has also taken the lead in partner management and strategic business development. 
Philipp is particular excited about motivating and inspiring teams and fostering an inclusive problem solving environment in fast paced settings. Since 2011, Philipp has led teams of various size (15+) with international backgrounds. In his recent engagement as Director of sales steering and business development Asia-Pacific Philipp contributed to a regional revenue increase of 10%+. In his role as a country manager of Romania, Philipp grew the airlines' market share significantly and implemented sales measures to fight upcoming low cost competition. 
Philipp spikes in problem solving, subject matter expertise and is a particularly caring and approachable people leader. Philipp is able to quickly zoom into the core of complex problems and provides guidance to his teams to achieve underlying targets, while maintaining an open team culture in which personal development goals of his teams are ensured.

profile_positions.description:
•	Develop and drive global sales and distribution strategy
•	Project leader for a project on ticketing and distribution 
•	Strengthen global sales distribution partner network
•	Optimization of Pricing and Yield Strategy
•	Implementation of a new forecasting model for Stage Entertainment shows
profile_positions.title: International Sales Strategy Manager

profile_positions.location: Frankfurt am Main, Hesse, Germany / Vienna, Austria
profile_positions.description:
•	Project leader for two projects within the Global Sales Steering and Planning organization
•	Project 1 (Incentive Efficiency): Analysis of the incentive landscape within LHG globally to ensure best possible effectiveness
•	Projects 2 (Budgeting and Forecasting): Introduction of new tools to forecast, support and measure incentives and their efficiency
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager Incentive Efficiency and Effectiveness, Budgeting and Forecasting 2.0

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for the commercial planning and steering of the sales organization in the APAC markets including market strategy, channel management, business analysis & development and partner management for the Lufthansa Group 
•	Planning and monitoring of the revenue and incentive budget for APAC 
•	Strong focus on identifying and developing new ways of increasing revenue by reviewing new innovative technologies, existing processes and leveraging synergies 
•	Process Manager for the D-Community in APAC – ensuring the NPO processes being established and lived in Asia 
•	Handles the continuous optimization of all flight schedule issues within Asia by gathering information, monitoring performance & identifying needs and potentials. 
•	Responsible for the sizing and successful implementation of cost cutting program SHAPE! in Asia Pacific
profile_positions.title: Director Sales Steering and Business Development Asia & Pacific

profile_positions.description:
•	Leading the global outsourcing project of contract management handling for LHG
•	Responsible for the outsourcing of the Lufthansa SME program handling in Europe
•	Developed automated contract creation platform for faster, efficient and simplified process handling
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Sales Services Outsourcing

profile_positions.description:
•	Leading the sales of Austrian Airlines and partly Lufthansa in Romania and Moldova
•	Establishing a good relationship with the biggest corporate customers and agents
•	Grow market share and implementation sales measures to fight upcoming low cost competition
•	Set foundation for the integration of Austrian staff into Lufthansa organization
•	Introduction of a second daily flight to Chisinau
profile_positions.title: General Manager Romania & Moldova

profile_positions.description:
•	Negotiate and establish integration of Austrian and Lufthansa teams in Eastern Europe and Middle East
•	Selection of staff (together with the local managers) for new sales teams using the best of two worlds (LH and OS)
•	Implementation and supervision of metal neutral sales
•	Monitor and challenge revenue performance in the markets
•	Network planning and optimization of flights to/from our core markets
profile_positions.title: Deputy Director Sales Core Markets

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for the Austrian sales organization in Armenia, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Moldova and Romania
•	Interface towards partner airlines: Tarom, Air Moldova, Atlantis European Airlines and Airzena Georgian Airways
•	Network planning and optimization of flights to various Eastern European markets
profile_positions.title: Deputy Director Commerical Passenger Division Central & Eastern Europe

profile_positions.description:
•	Country Manager Traineeship based in Moscow with the goal to learn all aspects of a field sales organizations
•	First leadership experience leading sales teams in Russia
•	Responsible for sales performance
profile_positions.title: Deputy Country Manager Russia

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for the Austrian sales organizations in Iran, Iraq, Israel, Libya, Syria and Turkey 
•	Interface towards partner airlines: Iran Air, Libyan Arab Airlines, Syrian Air and Turkish Airlines
•	Network planning of flights to various Middle East markets, including launch of the 2nd daily flight to Damascus
•	Negotiation and implementation of code share agreement with TK on flights to IST and ESB
•	Part of the project team “Austrian Premium Jet” establishing a new business class on flight to the Middle East
profile_positions.title: Deputy Director Commercial Passenger Division Middle East

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for the pricing out of the US, Canada, China, Japan and Korea for Austrian Airlines
•	Regular monitoring of the competition and coordination with the markets to ensure continuous competitiveness of the fares
•	Introduction of a completely new pricing scheme for China
•	Simplification of the complex pricing scheme in Japan (Elimination)
profile_positions.title: Market Pricing Manager Longhaul @ Pricing & Revenue Management
